website_summaries.verdict: The type of shampoo to buy when you need to undo damage from dry and sensitive skin. Will help moisturize damaged skin naturally.
pros: Makes hair shiny and easy to manage
Larger bottle compared to other premium shampoo brands
Light scent isn't overpowering after a morning shower
cons: More expensive than simple everyday shampoos

customer_reviews.title: The formula may be different
customer_reviews.text: I have used this particular brand and shampoo for over 10 years. After not having bought the shampoo for a while, I was excited to buy it at a great price. But now I’used it for 3 days, and it has left my scalp very oily and heavy. Im pretty disappointed so I’ll be returning this to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C McCoy

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo for dry hair
customer_reviews.text: It is good thick and the original. I have been using lerastase for years now and this is a good one for dry hair
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT Kerastase
customer_reviews.text: We have used this shampoo for 15 years and it is fabulous. However this bottle was a clear shampoo (Kerastase is white) it did not clean like Kerastace and left our hair feeling 'stripped'. Invoice says it was sold and shipped by WEST SIDE TRADING. We didn't open the bottle int ime to return it. Don't buy from this provider!!!
customer_reviews.author: BGR

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it. Or
customer_reviews.text: I have used this particular shampoo for over 17 years. I LOVE it. Or, I did till they reformulated it. For 17 years it has never left build-up and since I have very fine hair any build-up makes it unmanageable. After about two weeks of using this IRISOME formula, my hair looks dirty and stringy and oily as soon as it's dry. SO disappointing. I have no idea what I'll try next, but it sure won't be this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mattandtara

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fake?
customer_reviews.text: I'm thinking that this product may not be real Kerastase. My hair is falling out. And the shampoo that drips down the bottle (I've used this for product for years and it never dripped before) has removed parts of the label from the bottle. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lwb

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: My total favorite shampoo, for its fragrance and performance! I'm so happy to have found it at Amazon, at an affordable price for the salon size!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT KERASTASE! I have used this shampoo for almost 20 years and this is definitely not the correct shampoo. I don’t know what is in the bottle but it is heavy and greasy and for sure doesn’t smell anything like the real KERASTASE.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is most definitely fake. I have been using this brand shampoo since 2003 and it never left a very heavy oily build-up. I have bought other bottles of this shampoo elsewhere and it was fine. This is definitely not the shampoo as labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Choi

customer_reviews.title: Bain Satin Shampoo is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo along with the conditioner is nourishing and moisturizing. It leaves my hair feeling soft and free of frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mamea

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: My hair has gotten so dry. I love this shampoo and conditioner.

customer_reviews.title: Fake Branded Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw it out...it's not Kerastase quality shampoo...almost like it was fake. After washing, your was crusty and greasy..it was weird.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: Having used this product from a local source, I purchased this large bottle. Unfortunately, it left me with itchy scalp and oily hair. The seller was very accommodating in taking it back, but the product was not the same as was sold in the retail stores in Los Angeles.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very authentic and the only shampoo I'll use. The supplier was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bernoski

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this stuff. The large size lasts about a year and the price is right compared to the salon.
customer_reviews.author: george f schmalhofer

customer_reviews.title: To good to be true!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and could not understand why my hair was suddenly so flat and dull. My daughter came to visit and complained about the shampoo saying her hair look oily and flat also. I realized the bottle we were using was the "great deal" from Amazon. I purchased a new bottle from my salon and immediately you could see the difference. Maybe some people are getting the real thing but I did not! Will not purchase again!!! You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: jane Gardner
